mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager (managerID, managerPW, managerName, managerEmail, managerEmailDomain) VALUES ( #{managerID}, md5(#{managerPW}), #{managerName}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerEmailDomain} )
mapper.select: SELECT managerID as userID, managerPW as userPW FROM manager WHERE managerID = #{userID} AND managerPW = md5(#{userPW})
